name: KAMI
description:
KAMI is deceptively simple: fold out
colored paper to fill the screen in with
few moves as possible.

Relaxing and easy to pick up, you'll
soon find yourself deep in
contemplation to perfect each puzzle.

Created by State of Play, famous for
their handcrafted aesthetics, KAMI has
been created with real paper in an
elegant Japanese theme.

KAMI is tactile, engaging and
stunning to look at.

63 unique puzzles!

Premium Puzzles and Hints are
included.

Also includes a Calming and elegant
soundtrack.
